successes.title: emberlight: turn any bulb into a smart light.
successes.description: Mold your lights around your life. Control any dimmable bulb with your existing WiFi and phone. Automate with proximity awareness.

Pledges.description: The starter - 1 emberlight to get your feet wet and experience the awesomeness of emberlight. Includes free shipping within the U.S. (Suggested Retail $60)
Small room, early bird special - 2 emberlights which work great in an entryway, bedside lighting or any configuration with two lights. Includes free shipping within the U.S.  (Suggested Retail $115)
Small room - 2 emberights for a lamp, ceiling light in a small room or any configuration with two lights. Includes free shipping within the U.S.  (Suggested Retail $115)
Small room plus - 3 emberlights for a ceiling light, two table lamps or any configuration with three lights. Includes free shipping within the U.S. (Suggested Retail $165)
Single room - 4 emberlights to add to your living room, den or any configuration with four lights. Includes free shipping within the U.S. (Suggested Retail $215)
Large room - 6 emberlights to cover your kitchen, dining room or any configuration with six lights. Includes free shipping within the U.S. (Suggested Retail $315)
Large room plus - 8 emberlights for your open floor plan living space or any configuration with eight lights. Includes free shipping within the U.S. (Suggested Retail $410)
Two rooms - 10 emberlights for your house or any configuration with ten lights. Includes free shipping within the U.S. (Suggested Retail $500)
Beta tester - 5 emberlights which will be the first ones off the line, inclusion in the beta testing team and 1:1 discussions with the emberlight team. Includes free shipping within the U.S.
